key_risks: Regulatory and compliance risks due to operating in a highly regulated environment
Economic sensitivity, particularly reliance on small and mid-sized businesses in construction and manufacturing
Client concentration in specific industries like construction
Competitive pressures in the PEO and HR outsourcing industry
controversies: Workers' compensation claim issue involving a $17,000 check sent to an incorrect address
2011 incident of employees becoming ill due to carbon monoxide exposure
social_issues: Workplace safety concerns highlighted by the carbon monoxide exposure incident
Positive employee relations and recognition as a great place to work
governance_issues: Recent changes in executive leadership, including the appointment of a new Vice Chairman to the board

sources.snippet: A compromise and release of the workers' compensation claim of applicant Rafael Rivas contained an incorrect address for Rivas. His employer, Barrett Business Services, Inc. (Barrett), sent a $17,000 check to Rivas at the incorrect address.
